column2: ENGLISH
Request Cybernetic Implant

Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Implant from the Celestial Empire. Has an almost equal chance of being anywhere from the most basic level one implant to the maximum level five for any implant.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe celestial [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous cybernetic has been installed in you by a [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] wizard.
This magnificant cybernetic will bring you superhuman abilities!
Request Clone
Request a clone of yourself.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe celestial [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous clone has been decanted for you by a [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] wizard.
This magnificant clone will bring glory to your dynasty!
Request Vat Born
Request a Vat Born child made from the best genetic traits of you and your spouse(s).

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe celestial [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous Vat Born child has been decanted for you by a [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] wizard.
This magnificant child will bring glory to your dynasty!

Request Thoth Mk Implant
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Leg from the Celestial Empire.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Hand from the Celestial Empire.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Skeleton from the Celestial Empire, curing incapable.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Hiver Implant from the Celestial Empire, curing infirm.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Iaei Mk Implant from the Celestial Empire. If you already have a variant of this implant it will be upgraded one level.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Odin Mk Implant from the Celestial Empire. If you already have a variant of this implant it will be upgraded one level.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Pci Mk Implant from the Celestial Empire. If you already have a variant of this implant it will be upgraded one level.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Pluto Mk Implant from the Celestial Empire. If you already have a variant of this implant it will be upgraded one level.
Request the permanent installation of a Cybernetic Thoth Mk Implant from the Celestial Empire. If you already have a variant of this implant it will be upgraded one level.
